entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
